## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm interested in mining with Verus, can you tell me what's the main benefit of VerusHash 2.2 for miners?

**AI Assistant:**
VerusHash 2.2 is designed to level the playing field for all hardware, making it possible for miners to mine efficiently with CPUs, mobile phones, and even certain ARM devices. This means that miners can maximize their profit with their existing hardware. You don't need to invest in expensive specialized equipment to be a successful miner.

**User:**
That sounds great! How many blockchains can I mine with the same hashrate using Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
With Verus, you can mine up to 22 blockchains with the same hashrate. This means you can diversify your mining efforts and increase your potential earnings.

**User:**
I've heard that VerusHash 2.2 uses AES/AVX instruction sets. What's the purpose of those?

**AI Assistant:**
The AES/AVX instruction sets are used to boost CPU hash power, making mining more efficient. This allows you to get the most out of your hardware and maximize your mining potential.

**User:**
How do miners and stakers get compensated in the Verus protocol?

**AI Assistant:**
Miners and stakers are compensated through coinbase rewards, which are given for generating or finding a block. On average, 720 blocks are awarded to miners and 720 blocks are awarded to stakers each day. This provides a steady stream of income for those who contribute to the network.

**User:**
Is there a limit to the total amount of VRSC that will be created?

**AI Assistant:**
Yes, there will never be more than 83,540,184 VRSC created. This limited supply helps to maintain the value of the currency and prevents inflation.

**User:**
Are coinbase rewards the only way for miners and stakers to earn VRSC?

**AI Assistant:**
No, miners and stakers can also earn VRSC through economic activity, in addition to coinbase rewards. This provides additional opportunities for those who contribute to the network to earn more VRSC.

What is the main benefit of VerusHash 2.2 for miners?

VerusHash 2.2 is designed to level the playing field for all hardware, making it possible for miners to mine efficiently with CPUs, mobile phones, and even certain ARM devices. This means that miners can maximize their profit with their existing hardware.

Title: Verus: Profit Generating Protocol for Miners and Stakers
Article URL: https://medium.com/veruscoin/verus-profit-generating-protocol-for-miners-and-stakers-2d2b454aa330
Content:Verus: Profit Generating Protocol for Miners and Stakers
Future and present Verus miners: take notice. Be ready to maximize profit with your hardware. Mine up to 22 blockchains with the same hashrate. With Verus’ hardware equalizing hashing algorithm (VerusHash 2.2) you can mine efficiently with CPUs, mobile phones and even ARM devices.🔥 UPDATE 21 MARCH 2024: The first ever PBaaS-chain is being launched on April 1 2024 (not a joke). From then on miners can mine 2 chains simultaneously with the same hashrate!
More on the first ever PBaaS-chain launch: piratechain.com/v-arrr
Efficient Mining
VerusHash 2.2 is created to level the playing field for all hardware. The hashing algorithm uses the AES/AVX instruction sets built into most modern CPUs to boost CPU hash power.
Mine Verus most efficiently with CPUs, mobile phones and even certain ARM devices. Compare mining hashrates here.
Coinbase Rewards
1440 blocks are generated each day. On average 720 blocks go to miners, 720 blocks go to stakers (learn more on staking Verus). For generating — or finding — a block, miners and stakers get compensated. This compensation is called a coinbase reward. There will never be more than 83,540,184 VRSC.
If you look at the image below, you might think that the possibility of earning VRSC for miners and stakers goes down drastically. We explain next that earnings don’t stop at coinbase rewards.
Verus Coin Emission Schedule. From block height 10,080 on, all coinbase rewards of 384 and 192 VRSC were timelocked and then unlocked at random block heights. The last of those rewards were unlocked at block height 1,181,520.
Earning from Economic Activity
Miners and stakers don’t just earn coinbase rewards (the reward
